meanings.definition: A person or thing that is segregated or separated from others.
meanings.sent1: The segregants in the classroom sat apart from the rest of the students.
meanings.sent2: The segregants formed their own group away from the main crowd.
meanings.sent3: The segregants at the party decided to have their own dance-off in the corner.
meanings.sent4: The segregants in the garden were like individual flowers standing out from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The segregants in the zoo enclosure were clearly marked with a separate sign.

meanings.definition: The act of segregating or separating.
meanings.sent1: The segregants of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent2: The segregants of the colors made the painting more interesting.
meanings.sent3: The segregants of the socks in the drawer seemed to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The segregants of the ingredients in the recipe added a unique flavor.
meanings.sent5: The segregants of the books on the shelf made it easy to find the right one.
